ROM.Changelog:
# Changelog
* Bump Dot version to 1.1'' * Fingerprint: Setting up Pattern/Pin Fc fixed * dotOTA added(OTA system adapted for official devices) * fix dot version unknown * speed up lockscreen anims * Improve overall System animmation lag * Added timber as default music app * Display :Qspanel theme engine * QS tile titles visibility * Memory leak Optimisation * Three Finger Swipe for Screenshot * Advanced Bluetooth, Data, Wifi Toggles * Screenshot crop and share * Fingerprint authentication vibration * dotpapers: New walls added * Pocket mode added * added camera sound toggle * Allow disabling of FC dialogs * QS Header Icon settings * Nov patch merged * and a few more bug fixes * fc on pressing edit button on statusbar fixed
